title: Orbiter
description: Orbiter is bringing back static web hosting to help developers avoid vendor lock in and bring the web back to what it was meant to be.

title: Recur
description: Recur is a monday.com app that allows companies to implement recurring task functionality into their workflow.

title: Static
description: Static site generators are great for control, but they create a bad writing experience. Static adds a WYSIWYG editor to your static blog.

title: Write/Sprint
description: A simple writing sprint tracker built in SwiftUI for iOS. Track your writing sprint, time yourself, and see your progress.

title: ReadCast
description: ReadCast is a lightweight Goodreads alternative that makes use of open social data to pull in book recommendations and reviews while allowing you to track your library.

title: Perligo
description: Getting feedback on your writing is hard. Perligo solves this by allowing you to create writing groups and share your writing.

title: Graphite Docs
description: Graphite Docs was an encrypted and decentralized alternative to Google Docs. It was designed to give the writer control.

title: Changeup
description: Writing changelogs can be tedious. Changeup helps by automating changelog creation from your commit messages.
